subject: Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Dear Beneficiary,
Be informed that after the investigations into some irregular payments by the banks, The { O.A.U } Organisation of African Unity / (ECOWAS) Under the current Chairperson of the African Union, President Felix-Antoine Tshisekedi, in conjunction with the First Bank Pl c , has reached a memorandum of understanding and have formalized arrangements to payout a compensation of your outstanding fund payment of $520,000 to you through this esteemed bank. The First Bank Pl c.
By this new payment arrangement, you are to enjoy less costs as Your payment has already been approved after the Memorandum between the O.A.U  / (ECOWAS) and the First bank Plc, to be loaded into the First bank Visa Debit (ATM) card which will be delivered to you at your preferred Destination in your country, The ATM card will access your funds through Any ATM center service in over 170 countries and can be used at P.O.S globally. So therefore if you in any way happened to be among those that was being cheated by the fake and dictated online Internet Scammed report in respect of your over long outstanding payment, The O.A.U  / (ECOWAS) by the  reached out memorandum with the first bank Pl c, now uses this little opportunity to rewards you back on that same payment to show our heartfelt on your past experience at the wrong hands.  Please go ahead and furnish us with the following information below for accurate delivery without mistakes:
1.) Name in full:.....................
2.) Valid Delivery Address:................
3.) Your Telephone Contact...............
4) Home/Address..................
5) Copy Of your Passport/ ID.
On receipt of the above-listed requirements by our Debit Card Unit, Assures safe delivery of your loaded ATM card to your destination Within 48hrs, the only fee you will have to pay for this card package delivery to your designated residential address is the sum of $455 only which Is for the shipment of your new loaded ATM card via the Federal Express FedEx / D.H.L world's Courier shipping service.
Note: that as soon as the parcel is in transit, your tracking Number will be forward to you to enable you to track your Package wherever you are and to know the movement status of your package delivery. Repeat again, try and reconfirm your delivery information as soon as You receive this mail to avoid any further delay and take note that Your pin code of the card is 7864, do not expose it to anybody. And try also To reach us on the provided email contact bellow, so that we will be rest assured that this message gets To you safely.
Contact Email: 
adesolak865@gmail.com
Faithfully yours,
Adesola Kazeem
First Bank Debit Card Unit

subject: Re:   Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Adesola Kazeem,

Thank you for your email. It's quite interesting to hear about this new payment method through the First Bank Visa Debit ATM card. I must say, it sounds very convenient and efficient.

I'm curious though, how did my name come up for this payout? And could you please explain a bit more about the Memorandum between ECOWAS and First Bank Plc? 

Also, I would like to know more about the process of loading funds into the ATM card. How does that work exactly?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Brent

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary,.........................Brent
body:
[image: image.png]

*First Bank Direct Customer Center*







*Address: 15 Adeola Odeku St, Victoria Island 100272,Lagos, Nigeria.Tel:
(+234-816 507 8398)Fax: ( +234-816 507 8398 )Service Attendant: Mrs. Joy
Lewis                                    Attn: *Brent


*Sequel to  your responds and question, you name came out through your
email *hc08181@***.com as a victims and the memorandum was a reach
out agreement during the meeting with the ecowas, OAU and the bank to
tackle the excess of ongoing internet fraud using the name of this bank.

Also the said fund loaded was a credit into a processed master card in your
name  favor.


*Please Kindly view the attached copy of your loaded card, the front and
back side of your First ATM Master ATM Card for your confirmation.*

[image: Brent.jpg]
[image: 2.png]










*Also, be informed that this card package in your name from this bank has
today been submitted to the D.H.L Shipping Express Service for delivery to
your address.Please you are now advised to kindly get in contact with the
dhl shipping courier express service to put a claim as the rightful
beneficiary to this submitted package for delivery from the first banking
management.DHL International Shipping Express.Express Shipping & Mailing
ServiceAddress: 351 Herbert Macaulay Way, Sabo yaba 100001, LagosTel: +234-*
 816*-* 258*-* 6376











*Email: dhl_shipping_service2013@outlook.com
<dhl_shipping_service2013@outlook.com>Shipping Director:Agent Mr. David
CruzPlease do not forget to update us with every information that you must
have received from them in regards to this delivery.Expecting your prompt
response ASAP,*[image: ADESOLA.jpg]


*Regards*


*First Banking Managing DirectorDir. Adesola Kazeem. Adeduntan*
*Tel:  +234-816 507 8398*

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary,.........................Brent
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out and providing this information. It's quite interesting to hear about the steps being taken to tackle internet fraud. I'm also intrigued by the mention of a loaded master card in my name.

Could you please provide more details about this master card? How was it loaded and what does it mean exactly? Also, how did my name come up in relation to this?

I would also like to know more about the Shipping Express Service. What is their role in this process and how can I get in contact with them?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Brent
